ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESFITradeAccount.GID AS GID, ESFITradeAccount.Code AS Code, FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.GID AS GID2, FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.Code AS Code1, FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.Description AS Description FROM ESFITradeAccount AS ESFITradeAccount LEFT JOIN ESGOPerson AS FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1 ON ESFITradeAccount.fPersonCodeGID = FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.GID RIGHT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode ON FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode1.GID = FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.fPersonCodeGID WHERE (ESFITradeAccount.Type = 0) AND (ESFITradeAccount.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (ESFITradeAccount.Inactive = 0) AND (ESFITradeAccount.Code = @Code)
